mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.FUNDING_CODE, B.FUNDING_TITLE, B.FUNDING_SUMMARY, B.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM (SELECT A.FUNDING_CODE, A.FUNDING_TITLE, A.FUNDING_SUMMARY, A.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM ( SELECT F.FUNDING_CODE, F.FUNDING_TITLE, F.FUNDING_SUMMARY, TFF.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY FSL.FUNDING_CODE ORDER BY FSL.CHANGE_DATE DESC ) AS RECENT FROM TBL_FUNDING F JOIN TBL_FUNDING_FILE TFF ON F.FUNDING_CODE = TFF.FUNDING_CODE JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUSLIST FSL ON F.FUNDING_CODE = FSL.FUNDING_CODE JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUS FSS ON FSS.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE = FSL.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE WHERE TFF.FILE_TYPE='메인' AND FSS.FUNDING_STATUS_NAME = '승인완료' ORDER BY F.APPLICATION_DATE DESC )A WHERE RECENT = 1)B
WHERE ROWNUM <= 8

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.FUNDING_CODE, B.FUNDING_TITLE, B.FUNDING_SUMMARY, B.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM (SELECT A.FUNDING_CODE, A.FUNDING_TITLE, A.FUNDING_SUMMARY, A.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM ( SELECT F.FUNDING_CODE, F.FUNDING_TITLE, F.FUNDING_SUMMARY, TFF.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY FSL.FUNDING_CODE ORDER BY FSL.CHANGE_DATE DESC ) AS RECENT FROM TBL_FUNDING F JOIN TBL_FUNDING_FILE TFF ON F.FUNDING_CODE = TFF.FUNDING_CODE JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUSLIST FSL ON F.FUNDING_CODE = FSL.FUNDING_CODE JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUS FSS ON FSS.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE = FSL.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE WHERE TFF.FILE_TYPE='메인' AND FSS.FUNDING_STATUS_NAME = '승인완료' ORDER BY F.LIKES DESC )A WHERE RECENT = 1)B
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.FUNDING_CODE, B.FUNDING_TITLE, B.FUNDING_SUMMARY, B.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM (SELECT A.FUNDING_CODE, A.FUNDING_TITLE, A.FUNDING_SUMMARY, A.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM ( SELECT F.FUNDING_CODE, F.FUNDING_TITLE, F.FUNDING_SUMMARY, TFF.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY FSL.FUNDING_CODE ORDER BY FSL.CHANGE_DATE DESC ) AS RECENT FROM TBL_FUNDING F JOIN TBL_FUNDING_FILE TFF ON F.FUNDING_CODE = TFF.FUNDING_CODE JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUSLIST FSL ON F.FUNDING_CODE = FSL.FUNDING_CODE JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUS FSS ON FSS.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE = FSL.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE WHERE TFF.FILE_TYPE='메인' AND FSS.FUNDING_STATUS_NAME = '승인완료'
AND (F.START_DATE - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) < 7
ORDER BY (F.START_DATE - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) )A WHERE RECENT = 1)B
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.END_DATE, B.FUNDING_CODE, B.FUNDING_TITLE, B.FUNDING_SUMMARY, B.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM (SELECT A.END_DATE, A.FUNDING_CODE, A.FUNDING_TITLE, A.FUNDING_SUMMARY, A.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM ( SELECT F.END_DATE, F.FUNDING_CODE, F.FUNDING_TITLE, F.FUNDING_SUMMARY, TFF.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY FSL.FUNDING_CODE ORDER BY FSL.CHANGE_DATE DESC ) AS RECENT FROM TBL_FUNDING F JOIN TBL_FUNDING_FILE TFF ON F.FUNDING_CODE = TFF.FUNDING_CODE JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUSLIST FSL ON F.FUNDING_CODE = FSL.FUNDING_CODE JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUS FSS ON FSS.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE = FSL.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE WHERE TFF.FILE_TYPE='메인' AND FSS.FUNDING_STATUS_NAME = '승인완료'
AND (F.END_DATE - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) < 7
ORDER BY (F.END_DATE - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) )A WHERE RECENT = 1)B
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

select.if:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FUNDING TF LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY TC on TF.CATEGORY_CODE = TC.CATEGORY_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_FUNDING_FILE TFF on TF.FUNDING_CODE = TFF.FUNDING_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUSLIST TFS on TF.FUNDING_CODE = TFS.FUNDING_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUS T on TFS.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE = T.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE WHERE TFF.FILE_TYPE = '메인' AND T.FUNDING_STATUS_NAME='승인완료'
AND TC.CATEGORY_NAME = #{cri.searchType}
ORDER BY TF.VIEWS DESC
ORDER BY TF.LIKES DESC
ORDER BY TF.START_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FUNDING TF LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY TC on TF.CATEGORY_CODE = TC.CATEGORY_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_FUNDING_FILE TFF on TF.FUNDING_CODE = TFF.FUNDING_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUSLIST TFS on TF.FUNDING_CODE = TFS.FUNDING_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_FUNDING_STATUS T on TFS.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE = T.FUNDING_STATUS_CODE WHERE TFF.FILE_TYPE = '메인' AND T.FUNDING_STATUS_NAME='펀딩 진행중'
AND TC.CATEGORY_NAME = #{cri.searchType}
ORDER BY TF.VIEWS DESC
ORDER BY TF.LIKES DESC
ORDER BY TF.START_DATE DESC
